title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate gen AI and ML workloads with AWS storage (STG201)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 存储加速生成式 AI 和 ML 工作负载 (STG201)
abstract: Data has long been considered a strategic asset by organizations, but generative AI puts a renewed emphasis on the importance of a data strategy. Whether you are building your own model or customizing a foundation model, your data is a key differentiator for generative AI, so you need a data strategy that supports relevant, high-quality data. In this session, learn about the data tools that can fuel your generative AI strategy and the common data patterns required to transform your generative AI application from a generic tool to a program that truly knows your business and your customer.
abstract_cn: 数据长期以来一直被组织视为战略资产，但生成式AI重新强调了数据战略的重要性。无论您是构建自己的模型还是定制基础模型，您的数据都是生成式AI的关键差异化因素，因此您需要一个支持相关、高质量数据的数据战略。在本次会议中，了解可以推动您的生成式AI战略的数据工具，以及将您的生成式AI应用程序从通用工具转变为真正了解您的业务和客户的程序所需的常见数据模式。
